sentences.english: Such realism is useful in the development of automated CCTV systems.
sentences.chinese: 這麼寫實的程度，對研發自動閉路電視系統很有益處。

sentences.english: On image, CCP emphasizes abstractness while English verse tries to depict the real world.
sentences.chinese: 從意象上講，漢詩強調抽象而英詩注重寫實。

sentences.english: A nonrepresentational style that emphasizes formal values over the representation of subject matter.
sentences.chinese: 強調形式至上，無視內容的一種非寫實主義繪畫作風。

sentences.english: This method of "Realist Abstraction", was named by Tan Tian as "Macro-Far".
sentences.chinese: 這種寫實抽象的方法，譚天稱其爲“宏遠”。

sentences.english: The art of chromatic stone carving belongs to the domain of realistic creation. Thus it demands great effort.
sentences.chinese: 彩石雕刻藝術屬於寫實創作範疇，所以很喫功力。

sentences.english: The realistic character of modern Chinese was highly strengthened in this process.
sentences.chinese: 在這一過程中，現代漢語的寫實性得到加強。

sentences.english: The movie line is a full line. The line for the movie will be broad and have multiple scales.
sentences.chinese: 寫實電影線將是一條全方位線，有多種規格的玩具。

sentences.english: The added lens-flare is a detail that also adds to the realism.
sentences.chinese: 它所添加的光暈特效也是一個增添了寫實主義的細節。

sentences.english: Advocating truthfulness and realism in writing is the overall characteristic of Zhang Dai's literary works.
sentences.chinese: 尚真寫實是張岱文學創作的總體特徵。

sentences.english: TV is a realistic lens art reproduction of real life, with verisimilitude .
sentences.chinese: 電視是寫實的鏡頭藝術，再現生活真實，具有逼真性。

sentences.english: Through his realistic paintings Boldis creates a vivid embodiment of classics in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾蒂斯的寫實油畫，集中體現了一種現代的古典性。

sentences.english: It is the most specialized element of language to display to those realism.
sentences.chinese: 它也是寫實主義繪畫最善於表現的語言要素。

sentences.english: It was a kind of procedure through self-satisfaction using the ploy of true-life .
sentences.chinese: 而是以一種寫實的手法獲得自我滿足的過程。

sentences.english: The color change will give the photo a surreal and mysterious look.
sentences.chinese: 色調的更換將給予照片一種神祕超寫實的視感。

sentences.english: A change from surrealistic legends to realistic works.
sentences.chinese: 由超現實的傳奇故事向寫實性的“天然圖畫”發展。

sentences.english: Chapter III discusses the affection of New Realism Literature on Film.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探討了新寫實文學思潮對電影的影響。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
